    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int value,
            Card.Suit suit)
        Parameters:
        value - can be 1 through 13
        suit - can be SPADES, HEARTS, DIAMONDS, or CLUBS
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the card's value in't in the permissible range of 1 through 13 or the card's suit isn't one of HEARTS, DIAMONDS, CLUBS, SPADES
